name: prod_deploy_approvals
title: Production deploy approval requirement
description: Production deploys require two explicit approvals from authorized approvers.
content: Approvals: minimum 2. Each approval must be an explicit 'Approved' or 'LGTM' in the change thread. Ambiguous replies do not count.

name: prod_change_window
title: Production change window
description: Production changes only during 14:00–18:00 UTC on business days.
content: Window: Mon–Fri 14:00–18:00 UTC. Out-of-window changes require incident or emergency ticket.
notes: DEP-7781 was executed out of window.

name: oncall_response_sla
title: On-call response SLA
description: Page response within 15 minutes; critical incidents acknowledged within 5.
content: SLA: 15min response to page; 5min for severity critical. Escalate after 2 failed attempts.
